root: ^May I inquire about what troubles you, Ms. Naomi?
^That police inspector… all the things he said about my dad… That's not true… is it?
^Affirmative, Ms. Naomi. Mr. Steele was involved in some… legally and morally questionable activities.
^But... but why?! Why would my father risk his livelihood and his freedom like that?!
^The Proscription Act has made forbidden vices quite lucrative.
^But... why?! I mean, just this morning, we made more than enough to…
